name: Nidan
briefDescription: Nidan, a non-profit organization, was established in 1996 and is dedicated to work for informal workers and children. Today, NIDAN on its own and through its offshoots has a presence in almost entire country especially in Bihar, Jharkhand, Madhya Pradesh, Uttarakhand, Haryana, Rajasthan, Punjab, Uttar Pradesh and Delhi NCR. It has become a leading organization of India serving millions of underprivileged in the area of Education, Skill Development, Health, Waste Management, Social Security, Financial Services, Micro Finance, Organizing, Advocacy and Legal Aids & Rights.
